title: Poached Eggs with Asparagus
directions: Bring water to boil in medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Add vinegar; reduce heat to maintain a gentle boil.

Place one egg into a small bowl. Hold bowl close to the waterâ€™s surface and slip the egg into the water, repeat with remaining eggs; cook for about 3 to 4 minutes, or until whites are completely set. Gently lift eggs out of water.
Place seven asparagus spears on each serving plate. Top with two eggs and pepper (if desired).
ingredients: Fresh ground black pepper (to taste; optional)
